title: Cultivation Chat Group - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Appearance Changes   Body Tempering   Caring Protagonist   Chat Rooms   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Demons   Destiny   Divination   Fast Cultivation   Friendship   Ghosts   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Heavenly Tribulation   Honest Protagonist   Immortals   Lucky Protagonist   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Parody   Pets   Pill Concocting   Quirky Characters   Scientists   Slow Growth at Start   Slow Romance   Spatial Manipulation   Time Manipulation   Time Travel   Weak to Strong
author: Legend of the Paladin   圣骑士的传说
description:
One day, Song Shuhang was suddenly added to a chat group with many seniors that suffered from chuuni disease. The people inside the group would call each other ‘Fellow Daoist’ and had all different kinds of titles: Palace Master, Cave Lord, True Monarch, Immortal Master, etc. And even the pet of the founder of the group that had run away from home was called ‘monster dog’. They would talk all day about pill refining, exploring ancient ruins, or share their experience on techniques.

However, after lurking inside the group for a while, he discovered that not all was what it seemed…>
